00024 wp_1000V::~wp_1000V()
00025 {
00026         #ifdef __MDDEBUG
00027         className = "wp_1000V";
00028         macros::debugMessage(className, "constructor");
00029         #endif
00030         pawn->updatePallete(playerNormPallete, OBJ_SIZE_32X32);
00031 }
00032 
00033 void wp_1000V::weaponTick()
00034 {
00035         skipTick = !skipTick;
00036 
00037         if (skipTick)
00038                 return;
00039         
00040         //lightningy flicker of palletes
00041         if (pawn->getPalleteID() == playerNormPallete)
00042                 pawn->updatePallete(pawn->gm->player1000VPallete, OBJ_SIZE_32X32);
00043         else
00044                 pawn->updatePallete(playerNormPallete, OBJ_SIZE_32X32);
00045 }
